attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is beyond reason that a crippled old man with a bad heart can not be released to die with his family.
There is no possible excuse for keeping this man incarcerated on the whim of Jack Straw. If it was a case of public safety then the hundreds of Murderers and Rapists plus other Violent criminals should be kept locked up for ever, except they are not.
Lets drop the feeble excuse and send him home.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
